# Installation Guide

= Installation =

The "Copy As HTML/RTF" extension to Oracle's JDeveloper  and SQL Developer IDEs is installed in the standard way, which involves the following steps:

  # Launch [http://www.oracle.com/technology/jdev Oracle JDeveloper] or [http://www.oracle.com/technology/products/database/sql_developer/index.html Oracle SQL Developer]
  # Select the Help -> Check for Updates... menu option
  # When selecting the Source location, check "Open Source and Partners Extensions" or "Third Party SQL Developer Extensions"
  # In the resulting list, check the Copy As HTML option
  # Finish, and follow any instructions given by the IDE

Once the IDE has been re-started, select the Tools -> Preferences... menu option to select the format of the output that you wish to have placed in the system clipboard:
